#include <stdio.h>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define LL long long

LL Pow(int n) {
	if(n <= 0) return 1;
	LL x = Pow(n/2) % MOD;
	LL k = (long long) (x*x)%MOD;
	if(n%2) k = (2*k)%MOD;
	return k%MOD;
}
int main() {
	int t,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--) {
		scanf("%d",&n);
		printf("%lld\n",Pow(n));
	}
	return 0;
}
